case.summary: Appeal by defendant from trial judge's finding that plaintiff did not fail to mitigate damages by not accepting an offer of employment in Texas. The plaintiff was concerned about bona fides of the offer, his ability to seek alternate employment from Texas, and his suitability for the position. By the time plaintiff's concerns were answered, the job offer had lapsed. HELD: Appeal dismissed. Plaintiff's concerns were justified and his conduct was not unreasonable.
